## Project: Shikuyaa Website Clone

This is a frontend-only clone of the Shikuyaa placement training platform built with:
- React 18
- TypeScript  
- Vite
- Tailwind CSS
- React Router
- React Icons

## Key Features:
- Modern landing page with hero section
- Course listings and details
- Student testimonials/reviews
- Placement statistics
- Responsive design
- No backend - pure frontend implementation
- Fake authentication (no real auth)

## Development Guidelines:
- Use functional components with hooks
- Implement responsive design (mobile-first)
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Create reusable components
- Mock all data with static content
- Use React Router for navigation

## Project Structure:
- `/src/components` - Reusable UI components
- `/src/pages` - Page components
- `/src/hooks` - Custom React hooks
- `/src/utils` - Utility functions
- `/src/data` - Mock data files
- `/src/assets` - Images and static assets
